author: Joe Concha
title: Cuomos on Instagram say their son has contracted coronavirus
description: CNN host Chris Cuomo's son Mario has tested positive for the novel coronavirus, according to an Instagram post by the anchor's wife, Christina Cuomo.The news comes 23 days after Chris Cuomo announced he had tested...
